infobox.Japanese title:: 名探偵に弱点あり  (Meitantei Ni Jakuten Ari?)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Ran Mouri  Kogoro Mouri  Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi  Kazunobu Chiba  Eri Kisaki  Yasuyo Akimoto
infobox.Character design:: Masatomo Sudo  Nobuyuki Iwai  Kumiko Shishido (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri  Rikiya Koyama as Kogoro Mouri  Chafurin as Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi as Wataru Takagi  Isshin Chiba as Kazunobu Chiba  Yutaka Aoyama as Taizo Sakaki  Daisuke Kirii as Kohei Shibasaki  Kana Uetake as Rina Kadota  Shōta Takiya as Reporter  Emi Uwagawa as Izumi Onda
infobox.Opening song:: Sekai wa Anata no Iro ni Naru

sections.Situation:
One night, Kogoro inadvertently gets mixed up in a bank heist and attempts to aid the police by chasing the robber down. Unfortunately for him, the suspect climbs up the fireladder of a building in his flight and then jumps across the gap between two rooftops to get away, losing his gun in the process. Impulsively, Kogoro tries to follow him before he is reminded of his severe acrophobia. As he teeters on the edge of the roof, shivering with dread, the culprit's pistol is collected from the alleyway below by an unknown individual.

While the suspect is arrested later, his gun remains gone, and in addition Kogoro has suffered a major shock from his unfortunate experience, rendering him unable even to climb on top of a chair. Two days later in his office, he, Ran, and Conan watch a live TV report of one Taizo Sakaki, a suspect in a fraud case, being released on bail until his trial, when suddenly a biker drives up, draws the missing pistol, and begins firing at him! Sakaki is saved with an emergency operation, and since Kogoro recognized the gun, he decides to take up the case in order to blot out the feeling of guilt his acrophobia has brought upon him.

- Taizo's bodyguard

Then, his accomplice wants to kill her too, because she didn't know that he has an accomplice.
sections.Trivia:
- Izumi Onda's motorbike is a Honda CRF 250L, class All-Terrain Sports. The license plate number is 2 新宿, せ 38-17 (2 Shinjuku, Se 38-17).
- The 567 Koba Taxi is a 2001 green Toyota Crown Sedan [XS10] 3D version. The license plate number is 新宿 500, こ 58-84 (Shinjuju 500, Ko 58-84).
- The factory next to Onda Machines is named "Matsuda Machines" (松田 工機 ,Matsuda kō-ki?).
